campaigns.title: Help Build a Rural School
campaigns.description: Building a school in a remote village to provide education to 200+ children who currently travel 15km daily.
campaigns.creator: Rajesh Kumar

campaigns.title: Innovative Solar Backpack
campaigns.description: Revolutionary solar-powered backpack with built-in charging ports for students and travelers.
campaigns.creator: Tech Innovations

campaigns.title: Medical Support for Asha
campaigns.description: Critical medical treatment fund for 8-year-old Asha battling a rare heart condition.
campaigns.creator: Sharma Family

campaigns.title: Save Stray Dogs - Medical Treatment
campaigns.description: Emergency medical care and shelter for injured street dogs in the city. Help us save innocent lives.
campaigns.creator: Paws & Care NGO

campaigns.title: AI-Powered Braille Reader for Students
campaigns.description: Developing an affordable AI device that converts text to braille in real-time for visually impaired students.
campaigns.creator: AccessTech Solutions

campaigns.title: Water Supply Project in Tribal Village
campaigns.description: Installing clean water supply system for 50 tribal families facing severe water scarcity.
campaigns.creator: Rural Development Trust

campaigns.title: Solar Lights for Remote Villages
campaigns.description: Bringing solar-powered lighting to 10 villages that still live without electricity.
campaigns.creator: Green Energy Initiative

campaigns.title: Support Cancer Treatment
campaigns.description: Help Meera fight breast cancer. Funds needed for chemotherapy and advanced treatment.
campaigns.creator: Friends of Meera

campaigns.title: Flood Relief Kerala 2024
campaigns.description: Emergency relief fund for families affected by devastating floods in Kerala districts.
campaigns.creator: Kerala Disaster Relief

campaigns.title: Interactive Learning App for Kids
campaigns.description: Creating a gamified educational app to make learning fun for children aged 5-12.
campaigns.creator: EduPlay Studios

campaigns.title: Animal Shelter Construction
campaigns.description: Building a modern shelter facility for abandoned and rescued animals with medical care unit.
campaigns.creator: Forever Home Foundation

campaigns.title: Eco-Friendly Food Packaging Startup
campaigns.description: Launching biodegradable packaging solution to replace plastic in food industry.
campaigns.creator: GreenPack Innovations

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.content: Thanks to this platform, I raised funds for my daughter's surgery in just 10 days. Forever grateful!

testimonials.name: Arjun Patel
testimonials.content: Launched my startup through crowdfunding here. The community support was incredible!

testimonials.name: Anjali Mehta
testimonials.content: We built 3 schools in rural areas with funds raised here. This platform changes lives!
